keyword: how many calories in saltine crackers
title: How Many Calories in Saltine Crackers?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in saltine crackers (per serving of 5), plus carbs, sodium, protein, fat details, and easy tweaks for your snack.
h1: How Many Calories in Saltine Crackers?
assumptions: Plain, standard saltine crackers (approx. 3g each), no toppings or added fats.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, and ingredients; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 5 saltine crackers has about 65 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Top with 1 tsp cheese per cracker

faqs.q: How many calories in one saltine cracker?
faqs.a: About 13 kcal per standard saltine cracker.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in saltine crackers?
faqs.a: Around 2.2 g carbs per cracker, mostly refined flour.

faqs.q: How much sodium in 5 saltine crackers?
faqs.a: Approximately 205 mg, so watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: Are saltine crackers high in fat?
faqs.a: Low fat at 0.3 g per cracker, but toppings can add more.

faqs.q: Calories in a full sleeve of saltine crackers?
faqs.a: A typical sleeve (about 40 crackers) has roughly 520 kcal; portion control recommended.
